function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate room air mixing and uneven distribution of UV radiation","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of UVGI system, leading to increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Ensure good room air mixing and even distribution of UV radiation; use reflective surfaces to increase effectiveness","Technologies":"Ceiling/wall mounted UVGI, induct UVGI systems","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, ventilation system designers"},{"Description":"High room relative humidity above 75%","Impact":"Reduced UVGI performance by more than 40%, increasing the risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Maintain room relative humidity around 50% to maximize UVGI effectiveness","Technologies":"Humidity control systems","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, ventilation system designers"},{"Description":"Adverse health effects of UVGI on humans","Impact":"Health issues such as reddening of the skin and photokeratitis, reducing human comfort and well-being","Mitigation":"Use deep louver enclosures and guidelines for upper-room UVGI application; avoid direct eye or skin exposure to UVGI","Technologies":"Deep louver enclosures, upper-room UVGI systems","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"}]}
